name: Catch if you can
description:
Catch if you can - it is a dynamic game that requires from player agility.

The purpose of the game is to get more point, for that player must catching the objects, but not so simple, the other characters will be interfere player catching objects.

The player needs to catch:

- acorns (for each acorn +1 to the score);

- gifts (there are 3 types of gifts:

1) +500 to the score;

2) score divided for half;

3) during 5 seconds for each caught acorn +50 to the score.);

- golden acorns (for each golden acorn +1000 to the score).

No needed to catching:

- bombs (if player caught 3 bomb game is over);

- bad acorns (for each bad acorn -1 to the score);

- hives (the immediate ending of the game).

Also, if the player will catch the acorns in a row (for example 5, 10, 15, 20 pieces), then score will increase on x5, x10, x15, x20 points for each acorn.

Have fun!!
